title: On her birthday, US Rep. Rashida Tlaib, who is Palestinian-American, wore a...
content: On her birthday, US Rep. Rashida Tlaib, who is Palestinian-American, wore a keffiyeh & held up a “Guilty of Genocide” sign during Netanyahu’s Congressional address. “It’s shameful that members of Congress would give a standing ovation to genocide.”
author: Jason Kottke
